casebody.data:
David Jonathan MILLER
v.
PROGRESSIVE AMERICAN INSURANCE COMPANY. No. 49P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. E. Gregory Stott, Raleigh, for Miller. Glenn C. Raynor, Raleigh, for Insurance Company.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 13th day of February 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."
